sentence.Network_en: Any of various plants of the genus Atriplex, especially A. hortensis, having edible, spinach like leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 滨藜属植物一种滨藜属的植物, 尤指''. '绣球'.''花属植物, 具有可食的 、 类似菠菜的叶子.

sentence.Network_en: This paper studied the salt tolerance of Atriplex centralasiatica and its improvement effects on coastal soi.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文试验研究了中亚滨藜的耐盐能力及其对滨海盐渍土的改良效果.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explain the relationship between Tribulus terrestris and the fruit of Atriplex centralasiatica.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的阐明硬、软蒺藜两者药效学关系.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 马氏滨藜为藜科滨藜属（ATRIPLEX）多年生草本植物，同属的植物在台湾共有2种，另一种是台湾滨藜A. nummularia Lindl.。

list.abs: dynamic change of improving effect of atriplex canescens on saline - alkaline soil ., 四翅滨藜改良盐碱地效果动态变化.
